con:soapui-project.name: Testing - Quality Engineer
con:soapui-project.con:description: The Testing Quality Engineer project has been created to write several tests through this automated tool as a requirement of an application process for a QA position. It involves the test of a result from a ETL process in Pentaho which uses source data in CSV, XLS and TXT files and insert these data into a database, also it produce a XLS summary file with additional information. The project goal is to cover most of the required validations broken down by Test Suites.
